page.topic: Search Part - Radius Search - Sorting result by distance from the map center point
page.description: When you do a radius search (i.e. find all records with a certain distance of a map center point), it can be useful to order the records by distance from the map center point. This video shows how this is easily done.

section.description:
How the google maps can do radius search and automatically order data. 20 mile radius search. Nice if the results were ordered in ascending or descending order by distance from the center point. Search properties sort radius search by distance from center point.
In the SQL Query, added new virtual field. in Query(AlphaDAO) SQL Statement
Now when you click search Distance field to set distance from marker, goes from blank to filled Just simple click in property sheet.
